snippet.title: A: Can I use RMI to thwart android game piracy?
snippet.description: In short, DRM is bad. If someone did pirate your app, what makes you think they would buy it? They'll more probably just unninstall it and be done with it. DRM has plagued the PC games market already … , no need to do it for Android. A pirated copy does not mean a lost sale! And yes, piracy will always happen. Let me tell you some examples: World of Warcraft, an MMO. Check. Assassin's Creed 2 …
